charges.charge_description: 21:963 and 960(b)(2)(A); 18:3551 etseq. CONTROLLED SUB-IMPORTATION/EXPORTATION-did conspire to import heroin (Scheudle I). (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 months imprisonment plus a 5 year period of supervised release (1s)

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1), 924(a)(2) and 3551 et seq.-did knowingly and intentionally possess a FIREARM in and affecting commerce. (2s)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 months imprisonment plus a 5 year period of supervised release (2s)

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1), 924(a)(2) &; 3551 et seq-DEFT, BEING A PERSON CONVICTED OF A CRIME, DID KNOWINGLY &; INTENTIONALLY POSSESS A FIREARM IN &; AFFECTING COMMERCE. (1)
18:922(g)(5), 924(a)(2) &; 3551 et seq-DEFT, BEING AN ALIEN ILLEGALLY &; UNLAWFULLY IN THE U.S. DID POSSESS A FIREARM IN &; AFFECTING COMMERCE. (2)

On 5/7/92 the deft an illegal alien having been convicted in a court of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding 1 yr, did knowingly &; intentionally possess a firearm in &; affecting commerce in violation of 18:922(g)(1) &; (5). [1:92-m-927]
